abstract: Joao Vaccari Neto, former Worker's Party treasurer in Brazil, is sentenced to more than 15 years in prison for taking at least $1 million in bribes from oil company Petrobras; others involved in scheme are also sentenced.
lead_paragraph: The former official, João Vaccari Neto, was found guilty of taking at least $1 million in bribes.

headline.main: Brazil: Ex-Treasurer of Governing Party Is Sentenced in Petrobras Graft Scheme
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Ex-Treasurer of Governing Party Is Sentenced in Petrobras Graft Scheme

snippet: The former official, João Vaccari Neto, was found guilty of taking at least $1 million in bribes.
